Rooms.Name: Living Room
Rooms.Description: A space where people use it for their personal activities.
Rooms.thePath: You have been kidnapped and kept in a room. You have to escape from here and there's a dining room if you go Straight.

Rooms.Name: Dining Room
Rooms.thePath: You enter the dining room. The lights are dim, and the food on the table is not good to eat.

Rooms.Name: Store Room
Rooms.thePath: You've entered the Store room and you can find some stuffs to craft a meal for yourself.

Rooms.Name: Kitchen
Rooms.thePath: Here in the kitchen, you can cook food with the items which you've got in the Store Room.

Rooms.Name: Exit
Rooms.thePath: By going out of the home, you can see a Garage and locate the KEY to unlock the door.By opening the gate, you can able to find a pathway to Escape.
